description: A representation of a range of quantitative values.
label: Quantitative value range
name: QuantitativeValueRange

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/minVa._instruction: Add the minimum value measured for this range.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/minVa.name: minValue

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value range.
